confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete all teas?
confirm_import: Importing will replace all your current settings and usage data.
confirm_message_line2: Cancel and start a new timer?
export_failure: The {{app_name}} data file could not be saved.
import_failure: The {{app_name}} data file could not be loaded.
prefs_header: Set tea names, brew times, temperatures, and button styles. Change tea order (long-press a tea or tap the sort button above), or swipe to delete teas. Star up to {{favorites_max}} favorite teas to add them as app icon shortcuts.
prefs_hide_increments_info: Tap an active countdown timer to adjust it
prefs_notifications: Open your device's system settings to configure notifications for {{app_name}}.
prefs_show_extra_ratios: Show brew time, temperature, and ratio on timer buttons
prefs_show_extra: Show brew time and temperature on timer buttons
prefs_silent_default_info: Tap an active countdown timer to mute or unmute it
prefs_stacked_view: Stack timer buttons in multiple rows
stats_confirm_disable: Turning off stats collection will delete your current data.
stats_confirm_enable: {{app_name}} never stores personal info or location data, but your tea drinking habits will be recorded.
tutorial_text1: Welcome to {{app_name}}, a simple tea timer app.
tutorial_text2: Add up to {{teas_max}} teas and customize them to your liking.
tutorial_text3: Tap a button to start timing your tea as it steeps. Or, long-press the {{app_name}} icon on your home screen to time a favorite tea.
tutorial_text4: You can have {{timers_max}} timers running at once.
tutorial_text5: Enjoy your perfectly brewed cup of tea!
